content: row 7 p to m sl m p1 *k1 p1 repeat from * to 5 sts before m turn row 8 bobble all sts in pattern to 4 sts before next m cut yarn leaving sufficient length to weave in tail connect shoulders graft the 15 front and back shoulders sts together using kitchener st armhole edgings instructions are the same for both armholes starting from the center underarm evenly pick up *81 sts around the armhole and pm for bor work in seed stitch pattern for 6 rounds bobble in pattern *for roomier armholes pick up more sts in odd numbers up to 89 sts cut yarn leaving sufficient length to weave in tail finishing weave in ends block to measurements this pattern has not been tested nor tech edited if you notice any errors or run into any questions while working on this project please dm me on instagram @yellowcayenne or email at yellowcayenne@icloud com happy knitting this pattern is for personal non-commercial use only please do not share sell or duplicate this pattern in digital or printed format or sell a finished product using this pattern show and tell is always fun if you would like to share post your work-in-progress and finished vest on instagram don t forget to tag this project #seedlingvest and me @yellowcayenne i can t wait to see your version of seedling vest
